DOC.brief_summary: Background : Provision anticipatory guidance parent recommend effective strategy prevent injury among young child . Internet-based anticipatory guidance suggest reinforce effectiveness injury prevention , improve parent ' knowledge child safety . Parents receive guidance reduce child 's exposure injury risk adopt good childcare practice use appropriate child safety device home . Objective : This study examine effectiveness Internet-based injury prevention program parental anticipatory guidance enhance mother ' knowledge child safety . It aim increase mother ' knowledge motivation learn domestic injury prevention new Internet-based intervention model . It also target improve mother ' attitude perceive behavioral control domestic safety practice . Methods : The study would adopt randomize controlled trial design recruit 934 mother antenatal clinic postnatal ward two major public hospital Hong Kong . Participating mother randomize intervention control group equal likelihood . Mothers intervention group provide free access Internet-based injury prevention program anticipatory guideline whereas control group receive relevant parent booklet . Results : It hypothesize mother ' general age-appropriate knowledge child safety motivation learn domestic injury prevention primary outcome measure enhance . Conclusions : The Internet increasingly recognize practical cost-effective platform health education safety information delivery . The goal study examine effectiveness new Internet-based intervention program improve mother ' knowledge , raise mother ' awareness importance consequence cause domestic injury .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Internet-based Injury Prevention Program Enhancing Mother 's Knowledge Child Safety
DOC.criteria: Mothers attend antenatal clinics/staying postnatal ward Kwong Wah Hospital Queen Mary Hospital . Mothers unable read Chinese without access Internet .
